ReportBundle.ReportXML: <Report ReportGID="641174cb-34ff-4085-950e-de2a3d85f4f6" ReportUseType="2" ReportType="5" ReportName="Recipe Qty/Cost" Description="Recipe Ingredient quantity with Cost" CreatedDT="2012-07-09T13:18:07" ModifiedDT="2014-05-19T17:21:22.917" ModifiedBy="VAS" ConcurrencyTS="AAAAAAAALBE=" ReportVersion="1" />

ReportQuery.ReportQueryText: <QueryBundle> <QueryText>from o in ( from recipe in recipes {false} select new { recipe.Company.CompanyName, recipe.RecipeName, RecipeAF_CostPer_MQty = recipe.AFCost, RecipeAF_CostPer_LQty = recipe.AFCostLarge, RecipeDM_CostPer_MQty = recipe.DMCost, RecipeDM_CostPer_LQty = recipe.DMCostLarge, recipe.ActualDMPct, recipe.DensityFactor, recipe.Description, recipe.AFQtyHd, recipe.DMQtyHd } ) {where} select new { o.CompanyName, o.RecipeName, o.RecipeAF_CostPer_MQty, o.RecipeAF_CostPer_LQty, o.RecipeDM_CostPer_MQty, o.RecipeDM_CostPer_LQty, o.ActualDMPct, o.Description, o.DensityFactor, o.AFQtyHd, o.DMQtyHd };</QueryText> <PreQueryText>var recipes = vas.FeedWatch.Model.Entities.RecipeFactory.Instance.GetAll(null) .Where(r => r.Inactive == false); </PreQueryText> </QueryBundle>
ReportQuery.SQLStatement:
select * from (select ri.RecipeGID ,r.RecipeName ,dbo.GetMeasurementValue(SUM(ri.Quantity), 54) as 'AFLbs' ,dbo.GetMeasurementValue(SUM(ri.Quantity * c.DMPct), 54) as 'DMLbs' ,isnull(SUM(ri.Quantity * c.DMPct) / nullif(SUM(ri.Quantity), 0), 0) as 'OverallDMPct' ,dbo.GetMeasurementValue(SUM(ri.Quantity * iil.UnitCost), 54) as 'RecipeCost' ,dbo.GetMeasurementValue(SUM(ri.Quantity * iil.UnitCost), 54) / dbo.GetMeasurementValue(SUM(ri.Quantity), 54) as 'CostAFLb' ,dbo.GetMeasurementValue(SUM(ri.Quantity * iil.UnitCost), 54) / dbo.GetMeasurementValue(SUM(ri.Quantity * c.DMPct), 54) as 'CostDMLb'
from RecipeInstruction ri join Recipe r on r.RecipeGID = ri.RecipeGID join InventoryItemLocation iil on iil.InventoryItemLocationGID = ri.InventoryItemLocationGID cross apply (select top 1 c.DMPct from Chemistry c where c.InventoryItemGID = iil.InventoryItemGID and c.LocationGID = iil.LocationGID and c.ChemistryUseType = 2 order by c.ModifiedDT desc) c
where ri.Inactive = 0 and r.Inactive = 0 group by ri.RecipeGID ,r.RecipeName ) z where (1=1)
